title: String comparison operation
name: LGF_CompareString
description:
## Short description ##

Compares two strings and returns a number which indicates the result of the comparison.

return_value.description: Return values: left < right := -1; left > right := 1; left == right := 0

status_codes.1: RETURN_STRING_LEFT_GREATER_THAN_RIGHT Left string is greater than right string
status_codes.-1: RETURN_STRING_LEFT_LESS_THAN_RIGHT Left string is less than right string
